attributes.action: explain how the travel industry rips off parents during school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i fail to understand how the entire travel industry can triple costs for when schools have thier holidays. how is it that a holiday for a week in the uk is £561 the week before a holiday and £1610 during a holiday?

can the government please look at this and try and protect the parent

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
